body:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok, guys, so I've seen no one has his OF cape now, the only solution for this problem is sending an e-mail to  optifinex@gmail.com, there you'll have to explain everything and hopefully, your cape will return.
Thanks!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.body: You can also enter your donation email, and request a new password. Once you get your password in the email, enter the donation email, and password. Then you are free to change your cape :)
replies.body_tagged: You can also enter your donation email, and request a new password. Once you get your password in the email, enter the donation email, and password. Then you are free to change your cape :)
